Welcome to WebPy's documentation!
=================================

WebPy is an easy-to-use Python web framework built on top of Flask that allows you to add filesystem routes and use a much more centralized ``app`` object.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3
   :caption: Contents:

   getstarted
   routes
   cli
   debugreloading
   usingpyx
   usingmd
   docsref
